values.DEVICE_NAME_ASC: Sort alphabetically on the name of the device. De default name of the device is its HEX number, in ascending order.
values.DEVICE_NAME_DESC: Sort alphabetically on the name of the device. De default name of the device is its HEX number, in descending order.
values.DEVICE_NUMBER_ASC: Sort numerically on the number of the device, in ascending order.
values.DEVICE_NUMBER_DESC: Sort numerically on the number of the device, in descending order.
values.ACTIVITY: Sort devices on most recent activity first (e.g. newest message received).
values.INACTIVITY: Sort devices on least recent activity first (e.g. longest no message received).
values.LIFECYCLE_ASC: Sort device on its lifecycle state.
values.LIFECYCLE_DESC: Sort device on its lifecycle state in reverse order.
values.LIFECYCLE_ALPHABETICAL_ASC: Sort device on lifecycle name, alphabetically.
values.LIFECYCLE_ALPHABETICAL_DESC: Sort device on lifecycle name, alphabetically in reverse order.
values.ORGANIZATION_ASC: Sort alphabetically on the name of the organization that owns the device, in ascending order.
values.ORGANIZATION_DESC: Sort alphabetically on the name of the organization that owns the device, in descending order.
values.HEALTH_ASC: Health sorted from least to most severe (e.g. OK, WARNING, ERROR).
values.HEALTH_DESC: Health sorted from most to least severe (e.g. ERROR, WARNING, OK).
values.HEALTH_ALPHABETICAL_ASC: Health sorted alphabetically by health level name.
values.HEALTH_ALPHABETICAL_DESC: Health sorted alphabetically by health level name, descending order.
values.SENSOR_BRAND_ASC: Sort alphabetically on the brand of the sensor, in ascending order.
values.SENSOR_BRAND_DESC: Sort alphabetically on the brand of the sensor, in descending order.
values.DEVICE_TYPE_ASC: Sort alphabetically on the device type, in ascending order.
values.DEVICE_TYPE_DESC: Sort alphabetically on the device type, in descending order.
values.TAG_TYPE_WELL_ASC: Sort alphabetically on any tags of type 'well', in ascending order.
values.TAG_TYPE_WELL_DESC: Sort alphabetically on any tags of type 'well', in descending order.
values.TAG_TYPE_SITE_ASC: Sort alphabetically on any tags of type 'site', in ascending order.
values.TAG_TYPE_SITE_DESC: Sort alphabetically on any tags of type 'site', in descending order.
values.TAG_TYPE_PRODUCTION_AREA_ASC: Sort alphabetically on any tags of type 'production_area', in ascending order.
values.TAG_TYPE_PRODUCTION_AREA_DESC: Sort alphabetically on any tags of type 'production_area', in descending order.
